author: Chriisbrown
body: This PR adds the new emulated version of the track quality BDT to cms-data, it will be needed by upcoming changes made to CMSSW from the CMS-L1TK group which adds a full emulation of the track quality BDT. This is the data file for the BDT. There is not yet a PR to CMSSW for the code that uses this BDT
title: New Emulated version of track quality BDT
